text.text: Was in the area when my sister and I walked by this gallery and decided to pop in. The lady at the reception was welcoming and friendly, inviting us in to have a look while not being intrusive during our time there. It was a small gallery but there were many beautiful art pieces. I expecially liked those by artist François Bell which were mostly deconstructed items in resin. Another piece that caught my eye was by Taher Jaoui which was a fun and vibrant painting. Definitely take a look if you're in the area!

Definitely take a look if you're in the area!

text.text: Lovely curation of art. We actually stumbled into their Margaret River gallery after having a quick lunch nearby and fell in love with some of this pieces. Charlie was so lovely and offered to bring the art back to Singapore for us. Truly appreciated & would recommend to check REDSEA out :-)

Charlie was so lovely and offered to bring the art back to Singapore for us. Truly appreciated & would recommend to check REDSEA out :-)

text.text: actually really loved some of the pieces in this gallery. entrance is free, perfect for a walk after dinner or if you're waiting for your table! place was spacious and pleasing to the eye, and the staff was so friendly!

originalText.text: actually really loved some of the pieces in this gallery. entrance is free, perfect for a walk after dinner or if you're waiting for your table! place was spacious and pleasing to the eye, and the staff was so friendly!

text.text:
RedSea Gallery is right next to Dempsey Project and is quite an interesting gallery. Just when we were searching what we could do, we stumbled on this fine Gallery.

Firstly, entry is free and the place is very well maintained. Kudos the the management there. I noticed the receptionist volunteering to share information and keep guests informed on the different art and paintings.

The gallery was well curated and well lit. You can spend ample time looking at the gallery and head out.

Overall, a must see place and definitely recommended. We absolutely loved it! You will too!

text.text: Your staff was so warm and friendly to us. They made me feel welcomed and we loved the exhibition. We hope you do well as a gallery! :)
